Key Match Events: Mitch Marsh scored 177 not out from 132 deliveries, helping Australia defeat Bangladesh by eight wickets.
Post-Match Reflections: Marsh said, 'I'm sure my nana, mum and all the family will be watching at home, so hopefully it's put a smile on their faces.'
Marsh added, 'Obviously, it's been a challenging week for the family. It was nice to be able to perform for them and nice to get the win.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Marsh left the Australian squad earlier this month to return home.
Marsh promised to return swiftly to help Australia win the World Cup and was in inspired mood as he smashed nine sixes and 17 fours in his second century of the tournament on Saturday.
